bibl.title: Peter, Jerusalem and Galatians i. 13 - ii. 14; - Appendix.
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays
bibl.author: KILPATRICK, G.D.

bibl.note: Reproduit de: NT 25 (1983) pp. 318-326. - Pp. 435-436: the unpublished Appendix investigates the composition of the Pauline collection, using the evidence of P46.
bibl.seg: KILPATRICK G.D., Peter, Jerusalem and Galatians i. 13 - ii. 14; - Appendix.
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays (Leuven, 1990) pp. 427-436.
